statements: SELECT id, report_name, query_description, chart_type, data_source FROM data_visualization_reports;
SELECT * FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_name, data_source FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE chart_type = 'line';
SELECT * FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%sales%';
SELECT id, report_name FROM data_visualization_reports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_visualization_reports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT report_name, chart_type, data_source FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, report_name, query_description FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE chart_type = 'Pie Chart';
SELECT * FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE query_description LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT report_name, data_source FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE query_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id GROUP BY username, email;
SELECT user_id, username, email, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id GROUP BY username, email HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM ChartData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_name ASC;
SELECT id, data_name FROM ChartData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT report_name, chart_type FROM VisualizationReport WHERE visualization_type_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM VisualizationReport WHERE chart_type = 'BarChart';
SELECT data_name, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM ChartData GROUP BY data_name HAVING total_value > 500 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChartData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM ChartData WHERE data_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY data_value ASC
SELECT report_name, chart_type, type_name FROM VisualizationReport JOIN VisualizationType ON VisualizationReport.visualization_type_id = VisualizationType.id
SELECT * FROM VisualizationReport WHERE data_source_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM ChartData CD JOIN VisualizationReport VR ON CD.id = VR.data_source_id WHERE CD.data_value < 50
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT sale_id, amount, sale_date FROM sales JOIN orders ON sales.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT chart_name, chart_type FROM charts WHERE chart_type LIKE '%bar%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM data_visualization_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs JOIN users ON access_logs.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'admin' AND action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_name, chart_name FROM data_visualization_reports JOIN charts ON data_visualization_reports.report_id = charts.chart_id;
